title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the disappointing finish to the Nets season as they were swept by the Celtics in the first round of the playoffs and what this tells us about Kevin Durant at this point in his career. He sends out a warning to NFL teams who have their eyes on this wide receiver who could be on the trade block. He also had bad news for the 76ers as they look to contend for a championship and this super star looks like his best days are behind him. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Greg Olsen joins the show to explain why Russell Wilson will succeed with the Broncos. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
